content: to not give it a hat i hope you enjoy my pattern and please feel free to email me on bellle crochet@gmail com with three l s in bellle not two or message me on my instagram @belle essiecrochet if you have any questions on the next page i have put some images of my first bat hats pattern pack which will be released soon a halloween pack i will be regularly releasing different hat pattern packs which will all fit this little guy i appreciate all of your support and i hope you will keep an eye out for my future patterns on instagram and etsy thank you annabelle belle essie crochet 5 belle essie crochet
